name: Shpina
description:
Shpina is currently being developed by Cagatay Demir(@sagylel). Its an open world story based adventure game.

Main character is a 45 y.o scientist who was working on a portal project until the portal crashes and teleports him to an unknown village called Salum and he tries to find a way to fix the portal and go back to where he came from.

The game currently has a 8 - 15 minutes DEMO gameplay mostly based on dialogues and exploration.

The full game will have action mechanics with random dungeon system and some other systems.

Controls:

"WASD"  - movement (PS4 controller supported)

"SHIFT" - sprint (PS4 - R2)

"V " -  dash while sprinting (PS4 -  circle)

"X" , "C" - interaction (PS4 - cross , square , circle)

Have fun :p

Also you can follow the game on  my Twitter .
